navBar.dashboard: Welcome to the dashboard. View the last 7 days of approval status.
navBar.master: Manage master data: raw materials, parts,BOP info, and vendors.
navBar.additional_master: Manage additional data: overhead, profit, operations and more.
navBar.costing: Create, edit, and view costing data.
navBar.users: Manage user accounts, permissions and approval levels.
navBar.rfq: Manage and track RFQs: send requests, receive quotations, and more.
navBar.audit: Monitor system activities, track changes, review logs, and ensure compliance with regulations.
